HiðŸ‘‹, my name is Danya.


With a long experience in Java development, I am looking forward to new opportunities in technology.


My technological journey began with a passion for gadgets and software back in childhood, and now I have chosen my path in life while studying at the Faculty of Computer Science at Kharkov National University of Radio Electronics.


I offer strong software skills and project management experience that inspires and builds confidence in me in my teams.


My journey is marked by many scientific, sporting and social achievements.


I speak English at B2 level.


I am here to make a significant impact in a dynamic technological world with unwavering confidence and inspiration for my cause.
